Rigid Body
https://github.com/bulletphysics/bullet3/tree/master/examples/VoronoiFracture
https://github.com/bulletphysics/bullet3/tree/master/examples/FractureDemo
[Coumans 2011] Erwin Coumans. "Overview of destruction and dynamics methods." SIGGRAPH 2011 Course.
https://pybullet.org/siggraph2011/
[Harada 2011] Takahiro Harada. "Accelerating Rigid Body Simulation on Today’s GPUs." SIGGRAPH 2011 Course.
https://pybullet.org/siggraph2011/
[Muller 2001] Matthias Müller Leonard McMillan Julie Dorsey Robert Jagnow. "Real-Time Simulation of Deformation and Fracture of Stiff Materials." Eurographics 2001.
https://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=776361

HACD
[Mamou 2009] Khaled Mamou,Faouzi Ghorbel. "A Simple And Efficient Approach For 3D Mesh Approximate Convex Decomposition." ICIP 2009.
https://github.com/bulletphysics/bullet3/tree/master/Extras/HACD

VACD
https://github.com/bulletphysics/bullet3/tree/master/Extras/VHACD
https://github.com/NVIDIAGameWorks/Blast/tree/master/sdk/extensions/authoring/source/VHACD
[Muller 2013] Matthias Muller, Nuttapong Chentanez, Tae-Yong Kim. "Real Time Dynamic Fracture with Volumetric Approximate Convex Decompositions." SIGGRAPH 2013.
https://developer.nvidia.com/research
